name: manx fuchsia hedge socks
notes:
attention please! a little mistake got into my pattern with the cuff: please pick up and knit **2x** 28 (30/34) sts

needles:	circular needle 2.5mm (us 1 Â½) or according to your swatch, working with magic loop

yarn: 100gr sock yarn, fingering/light fingering weight 100gr/410m or 448 yards, solid and slightly variegated works best

sizes:.s (m/l) all sizes cast on 40 sts

additional: 400/400/456 beads size 6/0 or 8/0 high contrast to your yarn, 

beading tool. please test, some do cut your yarn
tapestry needle,

2 stitch markers

scrap yarn and a crochet hook
